headline: Jim Cramer on Abbott: “I Think It’s a Terrific Time to Do Some Buying”
summary: Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently offered insights on. Cramer highlighted the company’s acquisition of Exact Sciences and said that it complements Abbott’s diagnostic business, as he remarked: “This morning, Abbott Labs announced that it’s buying Exact Sciences, that’s the colorectal cancer screening company, for about $21 billion. headline: Abbott’s (ABT) Exact Sciences Deal is “Very, Very Important,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. This show marked more than a month after Cramer discussed pharmaceuticals and diagnostics devices firm Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT). However, the delay doesn’t mean he’s changed his sentiment about the firm. Cramer often calls Abbott Laboratories […]
